ygData.subject: RE: Mask of Deception
ygData.msgSnippet: Its not accelerando (or any other song as far as I can tell) that cancels out the UV, its Psalm of Warmth. Psalm of Warmth has cold resist + damage shield + UV
ygData.messageBody:
Its not accelerando (or any other song as far as I can tell) that cancels
out the UV, its Psalm of Warmth.

Psalm of Warmth has cold resist + damage shield + UV affect. When the song
pulses the UV affect overrides the affect from the mask so that when you
stop singing it you no longer have UV. Stop all songs and right click your
Mask again and the UV will return.

-Faras

> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Mask of Deception
>
>
> From: John Tatsukawa <jht@...>
>
> Tested it this morning in Neriak. I have no problems using
> it. I get the
> Ultravision tinge. I started up accelerando, then turned off
> accelerando.
> Still had the blue tinge.
>
> So it works fine for me as well.
>
> Windleaf, 28th level balladeer, Half Elf, Bertox.
>
